description:
Some edits to things just to do a little bit of cleanup on the guitar tracks, haven't done anything with any other tracks. A few corrections, acoustic track is a little more accurate with the really big things, but I'm too lazy to spend an hour trying to transcribe something like that (If you really want to, check this out https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XovixPbL1Do)

Sorry about the file being corrupted. I downloaded it from here just now with no problems, but it may have just been an issue on Songsterr's side that has since been resolved.
title: Carry On Wayward Son

description:
- Changed slides to slurs in vocal track
- Corrections to piano track
- Added chord symbols
- Corrections to acoustic and clean guitar tracks
- Added organ solo
- Corrections to bass track
- Corrections to lead track
- Added/edited some section markers
- Corrections to rhythm guitars
- Added swing where needed, changed triplet quarter eighths to regular eighths
- Made tracks look cleaner
title: Carry On Wayward Son

description:
- Made a few minor changes to the riff
- Clean guitar should hopefully now use the correct instrument
title: Carry On Wayward Son

description:
Changed the names of tracks.
Added Keyboard parts.
Fixed the rhythm for the riff around 143
Vocals: Added lyrics
Piano: Corrected the verses to the best of my ability, added what the piano plays around measure 15. I'm positive that the chorus is still wrong.
Guitar Parts: Made it so the note on the open E string is held out on the riff at measure 15, added pull offs to the riff at 89, made it so both tracks pull off from two to open instead of one of them being seven to five, put all of the solos on one track.

I'm sure I made a few more major changes, and a few minor ones as well, but this is all of the important stuff that I could remember.
title: Carry On Wayward Son

description: Changed tempo to 124bpm because 128 was ridiculous...
title: Carry On Wayward Son
